verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5319>shewed<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G5085>Tiberias<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> on this <S%G3779>wise<s%> <S%G5319>shewed<s%> he himself.

There <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G3674>together<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2381>Thomas<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G1324>Didymus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3482>Nathanael<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G2580>Cana<s%> in <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the sons <S%G3588><s%> of <S%G2199>Zebedee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>.

<S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, I <S%G5217>go<s%> a <S%G232>fishing<s%>. They <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2249>We<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2064>go<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%>. They went <S%G1831>forth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G305>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G4143>ship<s%> <S%G2117>immediately<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>that<s%> <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> they <S%G4084>caught<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> when the <S%G4405>morning<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G1096>come<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G123>shore<s%>: <S%G3305>but<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it <S%G2076>was<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3813>Children<s%>, have <S%G2192>ye<s%> <S%G3387>any<s%> <S%G4371>meat<s%>? They <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3756>No<s%>. Children: or, Sirs

<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> in a little <S%G4142>ship<s%>; <S%G1063>(for<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3112>far<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1093>land<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> as it <S%G5613>were<s%> <S%G575><s%> two <S%G1250>hundred<s%> <S%G4083>cubits<s%>,) <S%G4951>dragging<s%> the <S%G1350>net<s%> with <S%G2486>fishes<s%>.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G1205>Come<s%> and <S%G709>dine<s%>. <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G5111>durst<s%> <S%G1833>ask<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%>? <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it <S%G2076>was<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G2064>cometh<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2983>taketh<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>giveth<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3795>fish<s%> <S%G3668>likewise<s%>.

<S%G5124>This<s%> <S%G5319>is<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> the third <S%G5154>time<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> shewed <S%G5319>himself<s%> to <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, after that he was <S%G1453>risen<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>.

<S%G281>Verily<s%>, <S%G281>verily<s%>, I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G3753>When<s%> thou <S%G2258>wast<s%> <S%G3501>young<s%>, thou <S%G2224>girdedst<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4043>walkedst<s%> <S%G3699>whither<s%> thou <S%G2309>wouldest<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> thou shalt be <S%G1095>old<s%>, thou shalt stretch <S%G1614>forth<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> shall <S%G2224>gird<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5342>carry<s%> thee <S%G3699>whither<s%> thou <S%G2309>wouldest<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>.

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G5124>This<s%> spake <S%G2036>he<s%>, <S%G4591>signifying<s%> by <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> he should <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> when he had <S%G2036>spoken<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%>, he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G190>Follow<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%>.

<S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3140>testifieth<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> these <S%G5130>things<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1125>wrote<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3141>testimony<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G227>true<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> there <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> other <S%G243>things<s%> <S%G3745>which<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%>, the <S%G3748>which<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> they should be <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%>, I <S%G3633>suppose<s%> that <S%G3761>even<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G846>itself<s%> could <S%G3761>not<s%> <S%G5562>contain<s%> the <S%G975>books<s%> that should be <S%G1125>written<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>.
